A4.text: Ruffalo has gained international recognition for playing Bruce Banner / Hulk in the Marvel Cinematic Universe, beginning with the film The Avengers (2012).

A5.text: Ruffalo replaced Edward Norton as Dr. Bruce Banner/The Hulk.
